fields.answer_value: Django is a Python Web framework that follows the model-view-template architectural pattern.
The ViewSet is a class that contains the logic of which data should be sent in a response to the client.
A tool that converts Python data into JSON format
The DefaultRouter is a built-in Django class that defines the routes the API will respond to.

Object-Relational Mapping is a technique that lets you query and manipulate data from a database using object-oriented programing. An ORM refers to a library, such as Django, that uses the Object-Relational Mapping technique to query the database in our language of choice rather than SQL.
A property on a Model class that is not stored in the database, but is calculated during the response and request cycle with a client.
A property on a Model class that is not stored in the database, but is calculated during the response and request cycle with a client.
A custom action supports an action in an API's url that doesn't fit the standard create, update, delete style.
An endpoint is a URL that enables an API to gain access to resources on a server.
